thread.title: Messi to be tried in Spain for tax fraud charges
thread.title_full: Messi to be tried in Spain for tax fraud charges

author: AFP
title: Messi to be tried in Spain for tax fraud charges
text:
Messi to be tried in Spain for tax fraud charges Request of the public prosecutor to try only the footballer's father rejected By Published Thursday, October 08, 2015 Barcelona's Argentinian forward Lionel Messi complains after being injured during the Spanish league football match FC Barcelona vs UD Las Palmas at the Camp Nou stadium in Barcelona on September 26, 2015. (AFP) 
Argentina and Barcelona star Lionel Messi and his father Jorge are to stand trial on three counts of tax fraud that could carry prison sentences, a Spanish court confirmed on Thursday. In a court filing, the judge in charge of the case rejected the request of the public prosecutor to try only the footballer's father. The pair were accused in 2013 of defrauding the taxman out of 4.16 million euros ($4.69 million) in taxes related to Messi's image rights between 2007 and 2009 through the creation of fake companies in Belize and Uruguay.
